column4: i do "apt-get install azureus" and it installs an old version who won't even update itself
i have a 22" and it only does 1650x1050 max
i do "apt-get install azureus" and it installs an old version who won't even update itself, i tried downloading the latest .bz2 tar and this one crashes at boot, any help?
the packages are supported ... later versions are not ... (yet).
